headline: Jim Cramer Thinks Caterpillar (CAT) Can Go Higher
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Construction and mining equipment manufacturer Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT)’s shares have gained 77% over the past year and are up by 9.9% year-to-date. Jefferies kept a Buy rating on the shares and raised the share […]

headline: Caterpillar Taps AI Data Center Power Boom With 2 GW Alliance
summary: Caterpillar has entered a multi company alliance to supply 2 GW of natural gas generator sets and battery systems to a large new data center project. The power package is designed to support hyperscale AI data centers that require reliable on site generation and fast response capabilities. The order is described as one of Caterpillar’s largest power solutions deals to date and marks a deeper move into AI related data center energy infrastructure. Caterpillar, traded as NYSE:CAT, is best...

headline: Jefferies Sees Further Upside as Caterpillar’s (CAT) Broader Portfolio Gains Traction
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is included among the 12 Best Stocks to Buy for the Long Term. On January 27, Jefferies raised its price target on Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) to $750 from $700 and reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. The analyst said the setup for Q4 earnings “feels in line to potentially conservative,” pointing […]

headline: This Time, A Weaker Dollar Is Part Of The Plan
summary: The macro landscape shifts toward geo-capex and a structurally weaker dollar, fueling growth for hard assets and exporters. Read why PRY, CAT, and DE lead now.
